New Records: Bronny James became the first player in NBA history to score in a game with his father, LeBron James
Key Match Events: Bronny James scored his first points in an NBA game, and the crowd erupted in cheers
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James reflected on his son's Ohio homecoming and said it was going to be'real special'
Bronny James said it feels good to be out here with his dad â€” in their home
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James said it was an 'unbelievable moment' to see his son score his first points in an NBA game
Bronny James said it was 'insane' and'much more than I anticipated'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The crowd began chanting 'We want Bronny!' hoping to see the rookie they watched grow up
LeBron James received a huge ovation during pregame introductions and again when the Cavs played a video tribute to him and Bronny on the scoreboard
Others: Bronny James is expected to join the Lakers' G League team, the South Bay Lakers, once the team ends its five-game road trip on Nov. 6
LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father-son duo to play in an NBA game last week
